@graph.articleBody: HELP PORTRAIT | UK COVENTRY EVENT | GIVING PICTURESHELP PORTRAITHELP SOMEONE IN NEED WITH A SMILE AND A PORTRAITView fullsizeHELP-PORTRAIT IS A GLOBAL MOVEMENT OF PHOTOGRAPHERS, HAIRSTYLISTS AND MAKEUP ARTISTS USING THEIR TIME, TOOLS AND EXPERTISE TO GIVE BACK TO THOSE IN NEED.Help-Portrait is about GIVING the pictures, not taking them. These portraits aren’t for a portfolio, website, or sale. It’s about giving people who otherwise couldn’t afford photography, a chance to capture a moment, a memory…and a whole lot more.This is your chance to give to someone in need, a portrait, a smile and your friendship.We are organising an event for Help Portrait Day - 2nd Dec 2017.You can support Help Portrait in the following ways:1. Please share this on social media and encourage others to do the same.2. Organise an event in your own area3. Come and support our Help Portrait event if you are local and able to4. Make donation to Just Giving for Crisis who we are working with.Full details and info about Help Portrait (including a short video) are available on the link .https://www.alanranger.com/help-portrait-uk-coventry news Alan Ranger 24 March 2017Alan Ranger Photography help-portrait t-uk-coventry]news Alan Ranger 24 March 2017Alan Ranger Photography help-portrait LinkedIn0 Pinterest0
